    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(User user,
                  javafx.stage.Stage currentStage)
        Start up method to set controller and window settings.
        Parameters:
        user - Current User.
        currentStage - Current Stage. Used to close the window on logout.

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()
        Executes when "create" button is clicked. Calls createAlbum method.

      • onDelete

        public void onDelete()
        Executes when user clicks "delete". Fetches currently selected album from tableView and calls deleteAlbum method in User class.

      • onRename

        public void onRename()
        Executes when user clicks "rename". Gets old name from current selection in TableView and Prompts user for new name. Calls renameAlbum in User class.

      • onRowClick

        public void onRowClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Executes when user double clicks a row in TableView and Album in that row is then opened in new window.
        Parameters:
        event - Mouse click event.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If FXML is not found.

      • onSearch

        public void onSearch()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Use to search.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
